entry.title: Saturday: Chance of showers. High 8. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of showers this morning. Clearing near noon. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 except 50 over exposed coastal sections late this morning and this afternoon. High 8. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM PST Saturday 18 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 1.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Becoming cloudy overnight. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 except 50 over exposed coastal sections this evening. Low minus 1. Forecast issued 05:00 AM PST Saturday 18 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Periods of rain. High 7.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Periods of rain beginning near noon. A few showers near Zeballos and Tahsis in the morning. Wind northwest 20 km/h. High 7. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM PST Saturday 18 February 2023
